## Mini-Project 01: Exploring the Most Popular Programming on Netflix
Analyzed Netflix's Top 10 to determine why such shows became popular. <br>
A press release section is also included, using evidence to promote specific shows based on certain variables. [Link to project](./mp01.html)

## Mini-Project 02: Making Backyards Affordable for All
Explored area codes near metropolitan areas in the U.S. and determined which are best representative for a YIMBY (Yes in My Backyard) movement. \
Analysis was performed for these metropolitan areas, the determining factors being rent burden and population growth. [Link to project](./mp02.html)
